snippet: Most of the big French supermarket chains are gearing up for their annual wine fairs this week. Amid the hype, there are some good deals, too. Here's how you can make the most of them.
abstract: Most of the big French supermarket chains are gearing up for their annual wine fairs this week. Amid the hype, there are some good deals, too. Here's how you can make the most of them.

headline.main: The Secrets to Buying Excellent French Wine Right Now
